youtube.title: How Stitches Actually Heal Your Skin: Wound Healing Explained
youtube.description: Have you ever wondered how your body heals itself after a deep cut or surgery? This 3D medical animation explains the entire process of wound healing and how stitches (sutures) help the skin regenerate. Watch the fascinating science behind your body's recovery. #biology #medicalscience #healing
